test-case.name: date-001
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: with Z timezone. Also implicitly tests date to string conversion

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: with +hh:mm timezone. Also implicitly tests date to string conversion

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: with -hh:mm timezone. Also implicitly tests date to string conversion

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: with no timezone. Also implicitly tests date to string conversion

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: with milliseconds and timezone. Also implicitly tests date to string conversion

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test equality between dates.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test inequality between dates.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test inequality between dates.

test-case.name: date-009
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test inequality between dates.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test equality between dates without timezones.

test-case.name: date-011
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test equality between dates without timezones.

test-case.name: date-012
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test equality between dates with and without timezones. we currently assume that an absent timezone means UTC

test-case.name: date-013
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test less-than between dates with and without timezones. we currently assume that an absent timezone means UTC

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test less-than between dates with and without timezones. we currently assume that an absent timezone means UTC

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test less-than between dates with timezones. we currently assume that an absent timezone means UTC

test-case.name: date-017
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test less-than between dates without timezones. we currently assume that an absent timezone means UTC

test-case.name: date-018
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test whether a specific date is past or future. we currently assume that an absent timezone means UTC

test-case.name: date-019
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test sorting of dateTimes with high >9999 year in date

test-case.description: (Bug 27216) XPath 2.0: test sorting of dateTimes *without* high >9999 year values

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test that current date/time doesn't change throughout a transformation waste some time

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: current-date() function. Also implicitly tests date to string conversion

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: equality and inequality between dates.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: ordering relationships between dates.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test sorting of dates

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test equality between times.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test inequality between times.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test inequality between times.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test inequality between times.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test inequality between times with date wraparound.

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test less-than between times with and without timezones. we currently assume that an absent timezone means UTC

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test less-than between times with date wraparound. (The answer, surprisingly, is "false", because of conversion to GMT)

test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test sorting on times.
